sentences.en: Aero - tuned rear spoiler: Reduces lift, creates vacuum to maximize airflow through helmet.
sentences.cn: 航空调整后扰流板: 降低升降机, 创造真空气流,以最大限度地通过头盔.

sentences.en: Assist in stock organization to maximize free space and ease access.
sentences.cn: 协助定期整理库存以便获取更大的库存空间.

sentences.en: Each member of OPEC would seek to maximize its own production.
sentences.cn: 石油输出国组织的每个成员国都寻求最大限度地提高本国石油产量。

sentences.en: Eager to maximize output today, we are borrowing from tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 急于在今天获得最大的产出, 迫使我们不得不向明天借债.

sentences.en: In order  to maximize profit the firm would seek to maximize output.
sentences.cn: 为了获得最大利润，这家公司会把产量增至最大。

sentences.en: In order to maximize profit the firm would seek to maximize output.
sentences.cn: 为了获得最大利润，这家公司会把产量增至最大。

sentences.en: Institutional changes are also necessary to maximize the potential of this new physical and human investment.
sentences.cn: 为了使这种实物和人力投资的潜力达到最大,体制上的变革也是必要的.

sentences.en: It makes sense to buy at dealer prices so you can maximize your profits if you resell.
sentences.cn: 明智的做法是以批发价购进，这样可以在转卖时获得最大的利润。

sentences.en: Its aim is to maximize the difference between their value.
sentences.cn: 它的目标是最大限度地扩大它们之间价值的差距.

sentences.en: Maximize insulation weather strip door openings and seal ducts.
sentences.cn: 最大化绝缘,密封条,密封门开口管道.

sentences.en: New systems must maximize the role of ecological mechanisms and emphasize the use of renewable resources.
sentences.cn: 新的系统应发挥生态机制的作用并重视可更新资源的利用.

sentences.en: People are expected to act so as to maximize their well - being.
sentences.cn: 人们总是期望他们的行动能取得最大的利益.

sentences.en: Utilize bluffing ; bluff with the best - balanced frequency to maximize its usefulness.
sentences.cn: 利用诈骗, 经常的诈骗以最大化的利用诈骗的好处.

sentences.en: We need to maximize the space.
We will actively manage your portfolio to maximize the return on your investment.
sentences.cn: 我们会积极管理您的投资组合，使您获得最大的投资回报。

sentences.en: Why? Because I want to maximize my financial freedom.
sentences.cn: 为什么 呢 ?因为我想将我的财务自由最大化.

words.tran_cn: 最高的，最大的；最全面的
最高的；最多的；最大极限的
[数] 极大，最大限度；最大量
使…最大化；取…最大值（maximize的ing形式）
把…增加到最大限度；尽量增大（等于maximize）

trans.tran_en: to  click  on a special part on a window on a computer screen so that it becomes as big as the screen

trans.tran_cn: 尽可能广义地解释，达到最大值
最大化，使（某事物）增至最大限度，极为重视，[数学]解函数的最大值，最大限度利用（某事物）
